benefits_section.title: 15 Benefits of Trading In at THEI

benefits.title: High & Transparent Trade-In Value
benefits.description: Your old unit is valued competitively with an official appraisal system. Max trade-in age is 10 years (e.g., a 2015 forklift).

benefits.title: Upgrade to New Technology
benefits.description: Instantly switch to the latest units (diesel, electric, gasoline) that are more energy-efficient and eco-friendly.

benefits.title: Save on Initial Capital
benefits.description: The value of your old equipment automatically becomes a discount on the new unit purchase, easing your business cash flow.

benefits.title: Fast & Easy Process
benefits.description: All processes from appraisal, documentation, to the handover of units are handled entirely by the THEI team.

benefits.title: Hassle-Free Selling
benefits.description: No need to waste time and energy advertising or selling your old equipment to third parties.

benefits.title: Longer New Unit Warranty
benefits.description: The new unit from trade-in receives an additional promotional value of IDR 20 million from THEI.

benefits.title: Installment Scheme Options
benefits.description: The new unit can be purchased through a flexible financing (leasing) scheme after the trade-in process.

benefits.title: Free Initial Service Period
benefits.description: Get a bonus of free filter components for services at 250, 500, 750, and 1000 usage hours.

benefits.title: Market Price Certainty
benefits.description: Transparent appraisal value based on unit condition, working hours, and service history.

benefits.title: Improve Fleet Efficiency
benefits.description: A smart solution for time efficiency and rejuvenating older units in your fleet.

benefits.title: Promo Support from TJM Auto Care
benefits.description: Every new trade-in unit is automatically enrolled in TJM's premium after-sales program (standby technicians, etc.).

benefits.title: Free Corporate Gift Pack
benefits.description: Receive an exclusive package including uniforms, helmets, vests, and a safety kit with your company's branding.

benefits.title: Added Value for Your Company
benefits.description: Get a bonus Corporate Business consultation at Sentinel Law Firm as an added value.

benefits.title: Free Delivery in Jabodetabek Area
benefits.description: Enjoy free delivery service for your new unit within the Jabodetabek area.

benefits.title: Free Operator Training
benefits.description: We provide free basic training for your new unit's operator to get them ready to work.

steps.title: Submit & Complete Data
steps.description: Fill out the online form or contact our team with the details of your old unit.

steps.title: Appraisal Process
steps.description: Our expert team will conduct a thorough inspection to provide the best offer.

steps.title: Offer Approval
steps.description: Once the offer is approved, we will handle all the necessary paperwork.

steps.title: Unit Handover
steps.description: We deliver the new unit and pick up your old one. Ready to work!

proof_section.video_description: Transparency is key. Watch how our expert team conducts a professional appraisal process.
proof_section.testimonial_quote: The trade-in process at THEI was beyond expectations. Fast, great pricing, and a very professional team. Saved a lot of time and effort!
